Dear User, This booking contains Pending Payments.

Kindly, Contact the SAP FI team to approve/reject these payments.

textTemplates.name: unitTransferEmail
textTemplates.text:
Dear CRM Head,
This is to inform you that {!Get_Booking_Record.Primary_Applicant_Name_Formulla__c} has asked to transfer the unit {!Get_Booking_Record.Unit_Number__c} of project {!Get_Booking_Record.Project_Name__r.Name}.
Request you to approve the transfer.
Regards, Dynamix Group
